properties.name: Comments SPAM
properties.tagline: Block comment SPAM while retaining your privacy

sections.title: Automatic Bot Comment SPAM Protection Filter
summary: Purpose - Blocks 100% of all automated bot-generated comment SPAM.
Recommendation - Use of this feature is highly recommend.

sections.title: Human Comment SPAM Protection
summary: Purpose - Uses a 3rd party SPAM dictionary to detect human-based comment SPAM.
Recommendation - Use of this feature is highly recommend.This tool, unlike other SPAM tools such as Akismet, will not send your comment data to 3rd party services for analysis.

sections.title: Common Settings For All SPAM Scanning
summary: Purpose - Settings that apply to all comment SPAM scanning.

sections.title: Enable Module: Comments SPAM Protection
summary: Purpose - The Comments Filter can block 100% of automated spam bots and also offer the option to analyse human-generated spam.
Recommendation - Keep the Comments Filter feature turned on.

options.name: Enable SPAM Protection
options.summary: Enable (or Disable) The Comments SPAM Protection module
options.description: Un-Checking this option will completely disable the Comments SPAM Protection module

options.name: Trusted Commenter Minimum
options.summary: Minimum Number Of Approved Comments Before Commenter Is Trusted
options.description: Specify how many approved comments must exist before a commenter is trusted and their comments are no longer scanned.

options.name: Trusted Users
options.summary: Don't Scan Comments For Users With The Following Roles
options.description: Shield doesn't normally scan comments from logged-in or registered users. Specify user roles here that shouldn't be scanned.

options.name: AntiBot Detection Technology
options.summary: Use Shield's Unique AntiBot Detection Technology
options.description: Use Shield's AntiBot Detection Engine To Detect and Block SPAM Bots.

options.name: SPAM Action
options.summary: How To Categorise Comments When Identified To Be SPAM
options.description: When a comment is detected as being SPAM from an automatic bot, the comment will be categorised based on this setting.

options.name: Human SPAM Filter
options.summary: Enable (or Disable) The Human SPAM Filter module
options.description: Scans the content of WordPress comments for keywords that are indicative of SPAM and marks the comment according to your preferred setting below.

options.name: SPAM Action
options.summary: How To Categorise Comments When Identified To Be SPAM'
options.description: When a comment is detected as being SPAM from a human commenter, the comment will be categorised based on this setting.
